channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Tools for the Home and Garden
channel.desc: Whether it's for the inside or the outside, help is at hand when it comes to tackling those essential DIY jobs around the home and garden, including unique products and demonstrations.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season Fashion with Apricot
channel.desc: Elevate your style with Apricot's new season fashion. Discover trend-led pieces and signature prints that promise unique, feminine looks for every woman.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season Fashion with Apricot
channel.desc: Elevate your style with Apricot's new season fashion. Discover trend-led pieces and signature prints that promise unique, feminine looks for every woman.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: HoMedics Personal Wellness
channel.desc: Relax and unwind as we explore HoMedics latest massage range, designed to help you relieve any feeling of muscle tension and stiffness from the comfort of your own home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Gift of Good Skin
channel.desc: Enjoy the gift of good skin with a little help from the Naturally Active Skincare range from Liz Earle - designed to cleanse, hydrate and protect skin all year round.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Home Top Offers with Dyson
channel.desc: Tune in to discover our top offers in homeware and spruce up your home for less. Discover innovative appliances from Dyson including vacuums, fans and more to make life a little easier.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Join us to discover the Apricot fashion styles that your wardrobe needs to help you transition smoothly into the coming season.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: In the Studios with Marla Wynne
channel.desc: Step into the studio with MarlaWynne's latest fashion-forward collection. Explore versatile pieces perfect for layering. Mix, match, and create your ideal capsule wardrobe.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford New Leisurewear
channel.desc: Make down time more special in chic leisurewear designs from the Ruth Langsford collection. You'll find the perfect outfits for off-duty days.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Moda In Pelle
channel.desc: Discover fashionable footwear from Moda In Pelle which combines affordable luxury and complete comfort for you.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.
